market_question: Will Donald Trump be inaugurated?
public_sources: Federal Election Commission Data Portal (https://www.fec.gov/data/; U.S. government work (public domain under 17 U.S.C. §105).); OpenSecrets Presidential Race Dashboard (https://www.opensecrets.org/2024-presidential-race; Creative Commons BY-NC 3.0; non-commercial redistribution with attribution.); ProPublica Campaign Finance API (https://www.propublica.org/datastore/api/propublica-campaign-finance-api; Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.)
commercial_sources: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence (https://www.adimpact.com/; Escalation required); Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database (https://www.kantar.com/north-america/expertise/media/planning/advertising-intelligence; Escalation required)
timeline_alignment_guidance: Use FEC coverage_end_date to align quarterly and 48-hour filings with market price timestamps. After each report, forward-fill cumulative totals until the next filing to maintain daily continuity.
additional_notes: Pair presidential committee filings with joint fundraising committee data (e.g., Trump Save America, Biden Victory Fund) for completeness.

market_question: Will the Democratic candidate win Pennsylvania by 1.5%-2.0%?
public_sources: Federal Election Commission Data Portal (https://www.fec.gov/data/; U.S. government work (public domain under 17 U.S.C. §105).); OpenSecrets Presidential Race Dashboard (https://www.opensecrets.org/2024-presidential-race; Creative Commons BY-NC 3.0; non-commercial redistribution with attribution.); ProPublica Campaign Finance API (https://www.propublica.org/datastore/api/propublica-campaign-finance-api; Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.); Pennsylvania DOS Campaign Finance Reporting (https://www.dos.pa.gov/VotingElections/CandidatesCommittees/CampaignFinance/Pages/default.aspx; Official state portal; reuse permitted with attribution under Pennsylvania open records guidance.); FollowTheMoney – Pennsylvania State Overview (https://www.followthemoney.org/tools/state/pennsylvania/; CC BY 4.0 with attribution; mirrors state filings.)
commercial_sources: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence (https://www.adimpact.com/; Escalation required); Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database (https://www.kantar.com/north-america/expertise/media/planning/advertising-intelligence; Escalation required); TargetSmart VoterBase + Finance Enhancements (https://targetsmart.com/; Escalation required)
timeline_alignment_guidance: Pennsylvania filings follow pre-primary, pre-general, and 24-hour schedules. Normalize by converting each filing's reporting_period_end_date to UTC and aligning with matching market dates; forward-fill between filings.
additional_notes: Blend statewide filings with county-level late contribution notices for final 72-hour adjustments.

market_question: Will the Democratic candidate win Nevada by 3.0%-4.0%?
public_sources: Federal Election Commission Data Portal (https://www.fec.gov/data/; U.S. government work (public domain under 17 U.S.C. §105).); OpenSecrets Presidential Race Dashboard (https://www.opensecrets.org/2024-presidential-race; Creative Commons BY-NC 3.0; non-commercial redistribution with attribution.); ProPublica Campaign Finance API (https://www.propublica.org/datastore/api/propublica-campaign-finance-api; Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.); Nevada Secretary of State – Campaign Finance (https://www.nvsos.gov/sos/elections/campaign-finance; Official state publication; reuse allowed with attribution per Nevada Revised Statutes 239.); FollowTheMoney – Nevada State Overview (https://www.followthemoney.org/tools/state/nevada/; CC BY 4.0 with attribution.)
commercial_sources: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence (https://www.adimpact.com/; Escalation required); Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database (https://www.kantar.com/north-america/expertise/media/planning/advertising-intelligence; Escalation required); Civis Analytics – Battleground Finance Feeds (https://www.civisanalytics.com/; Escalation required)
timeline_alignment_guidance: Nevada requires pre-primary/general and 24-hour reports. Align using filing acceptance datetime, adjusting for Pacific Time when merging with UTC price data.
additional_notes: Nevada posts filings in Pacific Time; convert to UTC before merging with market timestamps.

market_question: Will the Democratic candidate win Wisconsin by 3%-4.0%?
public_sources: Federal Election Commission Data Portal (https://www.fec.gov/data/; U.S. government work (public domain under 17 U.S.C. §105).); OpenSecrets Presidential Race Dashboard (https://www.opensecrets.org/2024-presidential-race; Creative Commons BY-NC 3.0; non-commercial redistribution with attribution.); ProPublica Campaign Finance API (https://www.propublica.org/datastore/api/propublica-campaign-finance-api; Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.); Wisconsin Campaign Finance Information System (CFIS) (https://cfis.wi.gov; State-hosted database; terms allow reuse for non-commercial analysis with attribution.); Wisconsin Ethics Commission Open Data (https://ethics.wi.gov/Pages/CampaignFinance/Opendata.aspx; State open data licence; attribution required.)
commercial_sources: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence (https://www.adimpact.com/; Escalation required); Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database (https://www.kantar.com/north-america/expertise/media/planning/advertising-intelligence; Escalation required); L2 Political – Wisconsin Donor Files (https://l2-data.com/; Escalation required)
timeline_alignment_guidance: Wisconsin CFIS updates nightly. Capture the `report_period_end_date` and expand across days until subsequent filings.
additional_notes: CFIS distinguishes between state and federal committees; filter on federal office to match presidential vote margins.

market_question: Will Austin Scott be the first elected Speaker of the House for the 119th congress?
jurisdiction: United States – U.S. House of Representatives
public_sources: Federal Election Commission Data Portal (https://www.fec.gov/data/; U.S. government work (public domain under 17 U.S.C. §105).); OpenSecrets Presidential Race Dashboard (https://www.opensecrets.org/2024-presidential-race; Creative Commons BY-NC 3.0; non-commercial redistribution with attribution.); ProPublica Campaign Finance API (https://www.propublica.org/datastore/api/propublica-campaign-finance-api; Free for non-commercial use; registration and attribution required.); Clerk of the U.S. House – Financial Disclosure Reports (https://disclosures-clerk.house.gov/PublicDisclosure/FinancialDisclosure; U.S. government work (public domain).)
commercial_sources: AdImpact Political Advertising Intelligence (https://www.adimpact.com/; Escalation required); Kantar/CMAG Political Advertising Database (https://www.kantar.com/north-america/expertise/media/planning/advertising-intelligence; Escalation required); Quorum Federal Lobbying & PAC Contributions (https://www.quorum.us/; Escalation required)
timeline_alignment_guidance: Candidate committees file monthly; leadership PACs file semi-annually. Join on FEC committee ID, using filing_received_date to sync with market moves around leadership announcements.
additional_notes: Leadership races also hinge on NRCC/DCCC transfers; capture party committee filings for a holistic view.

market_question: Will Nicolae Ciucă win the 2024 Romanian Presidential election?

timeline_alignment_guidance: AEP posts pre-campaign and campaign expenditure statements stamped with submission dates. Manual OCR may be required; align to submission_date to observe lagged effects on market prices.

market_question: Will Lee Jae-myung be elected the next president of South Korea?
public_sources: National Election Commission – Political Funds Integrated Information System (https://nef.nec.go.kr/; Korean public sector licence (KOGL Type 1); attribution required.); Korean Statistical Information Service (KOSIS) – Political Funds (https://kosis.kr/eng/; KOGL Type 1; attribution required.)

timeline_alignment_guidance: NEC system exports monthly ledgers with `report_date`. Use Korean Standard Time when mapping to price data; expect updates within 7 days of filing deadlines.
additional_notes: NEC portal requires Korean language navigation; coordinate with bilingual analyst for data extraction.

market_question: Will Rafał Trzaskowski be the next President of Poland?
public_sources: National Electoral Commission (PKW) – Election Finance Disclosures (https://wybory.gov.pl; Official government publication; reuse permitted with attribution.); OpenSpending Poland – Campaign Finance Explorer (https://openspending.pl/; CC BY 4.0 license.)
